meanings.sent1: She focalised on her homework to finish it quickly.
meanings.sent2: He always focalised on his goals to achieve success.
meanings.sent3: The cat focalised on the moving laser pointer, trying to catch it.
meanings.sent4: Her mind focalised on the beautiful sunset, blocking out all distractions.
meanings.sent5: The detective focalised on the tiny clue, unraveling the mystery.

meanings.sent3: The focalised cake at the party was a hit among the guests.
